title: Minimum standard for ranked games.
body:
As I understand it the only requirement to be able to play ranked games it be level 30 and have a handful of champs (16-20?).  Given the number of people that have no idea how to play that are playing ranked and trashing games for others can some more requirements for ranked games be added?

Something simple like a minimum number of normal game wins would be simple and effective. It would stop the script players levelling to 30 in ai games then playing ranked with no runes etc. It might also make people think about how they treat others and whether they should troll games, rage quit etc as it would take some effort to get a new account up to be able to play ranked. 

I am open to suggestions and I hope that RIOT would give this some thought too. a reasonable minimum number of normal wins like 100 would be reasonable. It is enough wins for people to have plenty of ip for setting up a few rune pages without having to shell out for lots of ip boosts.

Anyone else have any thoughts on requirements for ranked games?

replies.body: I suggest a 10 game probation. Say, you need to win 10 games in probation to start ranked. After you drop to 0 points in Bronzs 5 and lost, you will drop back to probation and need to win another 10 games to get back to start ranked again.

Maybe have a "ban" period as well?

If people lose > 3/4 of games while in probation, remove them from the ranked queues for a couple of weeks or something, encourage them to play some normals and get some practice in.

No, that's just stupid. if you loss 7-8 games out of your 10 probation games in your first season you just go to bronze 3-4 and try to rank up from there.

If the summoner lost all 10 then yes have a ban period from ranked, but if you win any amount of games then no the Summoner shouldn't be banned from ranked ques.

Sorry, to clarify:

 - Play 10 games or whatever to get placed in ranked
 - Play ranked games
 - IF you suck/get reported etc. and get pushed to the bottom of the ladder you have a 10 game period to "redeem" yourself
 - IF you lose too many games in that "probation" period you get removed from the ranked queues for a short time
 - After a week or something you can restart your ranked placements

It was just an idea to try and encourage people that really suck to play normal games and get some practice in - *definitely* not any serious consequences.
Ah ok now I understand a bit better now.

To be required to win 200 or more normals to be able to play ranked is way too many. I suggested 100 normal wins because it is pretty realistic number to give you enough ip to get a decent bunch of runes to have 3-4 different pages set up and it gives you a decent number of games in which to try a range of champs and roles. 

Being required to win a number of normal games would also stop the people that script level accounts to 30 by playing ai games and then going straight to ranked. (By script play accounts i mean the ones that pick a champ never buy anything, never communicate and follow a particular team mate around all game. they dont back or use summoners, they just walk, even if they are going past an enemy turret and get killed.)

The minimum standard for ranked games are as followed:
1) Your Summoner level is 30.
2) You must own 16 Champions. (5 for each team + the 6 bans - 5+5+6=16).

Very easy to enter ranked and if you do bad you just go to a lower tier class because, that's what the lower tiers were made for. Summoners that need to improve there game.
If you have been in bronze for the past 3 seasons, I don't think it is the people on your teams fault...

Yeah I sent riot a message asking for more ranked restrictions.
People can just hit lvl 30 and jump in, not know what to do and just get crushed.

4 people then suffer a loss because 1 guy didn't know anything.
I think the minimal norm wins should be 400.
I have to disagree with you there, 400 wins is way too much before someone to able to do ranked, maybe 200-250 wins MAX.
200 wins is a total of at least 400 games, upwards of 200 hours! I know some people really suck, but forcing someone to play 200-300 hours is going way over the top, there has to be a better way.
I've seen silver 1 to gold 3 players with only 380 wins in normal mode...

Why should people need to be a certain skill level to play ranked? The people who have no idea what they're doing will end up at a low rank, thats the point. If you have so many of these people in your games, maybe you aren't as good as you think.

Other than that, agreed. I think 300 wins in Normals and maybe 2 full Rune Pages should do.

Why is it that bronzie's keep complaining about people new to ranked?

Your not going to get someone new to ranked unless they are seriously losing all their ranked games, and stiff shit if you do.

I had to do 200 games before I was rank 30 and because riots dum ass runes I spent so much money on runes as I bout them lv 1 and 2 runes I still don't have that many and as for champs a lv 30 who just got there will only have about 10 champs unlocked as they don't get much money from a game and thous lv 1 runes are there to get the new players to get them so they cant play ranked as for the games there are plat players that only have 200 to 300 games played in norms not all one  so owell lets just make it so they need to play in norms for a week or a month to play ranked agene
This definitely needs attention but what if someone is equally experienced but loses more games? And people should be encouraged to use runes from the get go
